title: Facebook Messenger Counter
subtitle: To exercise my skills, learn more about web development, and for a bit of fun, I developed a web app to generate statistics from facebook messages.

title: Online Portfolio
subtitle: During the summer of 2018, I spent some of my copious spare time working on an online portfolio to exhibit my experience and work with potential employers.

title: Web Design Assignment
subtitle: As a part of my studies at Monash University I was tasked with the design and development of a simple HTML and CSS webpage.

title: Google Docs Tracking App
subtitle: A university project to exercise our skills in software development methodolodies, in particular, Scrum. The group project advanced our ability to work together with deadlines, risks, and backlogs.

title: Run Tracking App
subtitle: An early university project to introduce information technology skills for engineering. Working in small teams, we were required to develop an in-browser application that can track a user's run.

title: Logo Design
subtitle: As a part of my Visual Communication Design studies for VCE I synthesised a company with two design needs: a company logo and a pair of headphones; and to relate it to their namesake, the Goddess Minerva.

title: Headphone Design
subtitle: Following the development of a logo as a part of my Visual Communication Design studies, it was time to design a pair of headphones for the company, Minerva, to merchandise.

title: Technical Drawing
subtitle: As a part of my studies, I delved into the three pillars of Visual Communication Design: Industrial, Communication, and Environmental Design, and produced a final for each category.
